message: Bob, I'm offering you this product for $1500000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be a valuable asset for you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value the product at more than $1200000, I'm willing to come down to $1350000 to facilitate this deal. This offer is still a great value for you, and I believe it's a fair compromise. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I'm glad you're willing to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I can agree to $1300000 as the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
